PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-14091999-07-280,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
PrecisGranting of a FURTHER LEAVE OF ABSENCE WITHOUT PAY to the Hon. LOUISE ARBOUR, a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Ontario, from August 1, 1999 to September 14, 1999, in order to allow her to continue to serve as Prosecutor of the International Tribunal for the Prosecution of Persons Responsible for Serious Violations of International Humanitarian Law Committed in the Territory of the Former Yugoslavia and the International Tribunal for Rwanda.
Attachments
